item.title: Docs: CMD5
item.description:
A convenient commandline shell allowing to define commands in IEEE format.

Links

  • More information can be foun in the Manual Page (external link)

item.title: Docs: Common
item.description: A set of common utility collection that not only makes the development of cloudmesh easier but can be used generally.

item.title: Docs: Configuration
item.description: A set of Configuration utility collection that not only makes the development of cloudmesh easier but can be used generally.

item.title: Docs: Installer
item.description: A pip installable module that simplifies the instalation of multiple plugins via bundles.

item.title: Docs: Inventory
item.description: A set of Inventory utility collection that not only makes the development of cloudmesh easier but can be used generally.
